name: January
description:
Objectives:

None! Just kill the robots, go for a swim, and jump over stuff!

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD, D-PAD, Left-Stick
  • Knife: J, PS-Square
  • Throw Rock: K, PS-Triangle
  • Jump: Space, PS-Cross

Notable features:

  • You can jump over stuff
  • You can go into the water and you sink (and move more slowly)
  • You can throw rocks over things (higher things if you jump)
  • Green syringes make you stronger and faster
  • Violet syringes make you slower and weaker, but heal over time and reduce damage taken
